author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
This PR includes #8808 (E/g seeded by jets) #8904 (fastsim backport) #8929 (fixes backport) #8931 (HLT updates) plus backport of #8916, and makes HLT work with all that!

Rebased to CMSSW_7_4_2 - at this stage it inlucdes just the fastsim PR #8904 plus HLT-only work.

Rebased further to 7_4_X (as of 20-May 5:10PM) as #8904 is now integrated in it...
...should reduce signatures required
title: HLT updates on top of 741 with FastSim for 74X
